title: Action Blast 1
description: Elite mercenaries race against time to stop a nuclear threat. High-octane thrills guaranteed.

title: Action Blast 2
description: Former spy returns for one last mission when her daughter is kidnapped. Revenge never looked so good.

title: Action Blast 3
description: Street racer gets caught in international heist gone wrong. Speed is his only weapon.

title: Action Blast 4
description: Special forces team battles alien invasion in downtown Tokyo. Humanity's last stand begins.

title: Action Blast 5
description: Retired assassin protects witness from corrupt police force. Trust no one in this thriller.

title: Action Blast 6
description: Submarine crew discovers ancient sea monster during rescue mission. Deep sea terror awaits.

title: Action Blast 7
description: Parkour expert infiltrates heavily guarded skyscraper. Every jump could be his last.

title: Action Blast 8
description: Martial arts champion enters underground tournament for revenge. Honor demands blood.

title: Action Blast 9
description: Bank robbers trapped with hostages as police close in. Perfect plan meets harsh reality.

title: Action Blast 10
description: Fighter pilot leads resistance against robot uprising. Sky battles determine Earth's fate.

title: Action Blast 11
description: Treasure hunter races rival gangs to lost Aztec gold. Ancient curses awaken.

title: Action Blast 12
description: Prison break specialist attempts impossible escape from orbital facility. Space has no exits.

title: Action Blast 13
description: Stunt driver becomes getaway expert for dangerous heist crew. One wrong turn means death.

title: Action Blast 14
description: Arctic research team battles genetically modified predators. Cold isn't the only killer.

title: Action Blast 15
description: Bodyguard discovers assassination plot against president. Trust becomes deadly liability.

title: Action Blast 16
description: Mountain rescue team faces avalanche and armed militants. Nature and man collide.

title: Action Blast 17
description: Cyber warrior battles AI virus threatening global networks. Code is the new battlefield.

title: Action Blast 18
description: Train passengers fight hijackers on transcontinental express. No stops until justice.

title: Action Blast 19
description: Desert convoy protects vaccine shipment from raiders. Medicine worth more than gold.

title: Action Blast 20
description: Firefighter uncovers arson conspiracy while saving lives. Heroes don't always wear capes.

title: Comedy Gold 1
description: Awkward accountant accidentally becomes mob boss. Hilarious misunderstandings ensue.

title: Comedy Gold 2
description: Wedding planner's own wedding goes spectacularly wrong. Murphy's Law in action.

title: Comedy Gold 3
description: Substitute teacher pretends to be principal for a day. School will never be the same.

title: Comedy Gold 4
description: Food critic loses taste buds, fakes reviews. Culinary chaos at its finest.

title: Comedy Gold 5
description: Twins switch lives without telling their spouses. Double trouble, double laughs.

title: Comedy Gold 6
description: Pet sitter agrees to watch 30 animals simultaneously. Chaos has four legs and fur.

title: Comedy Gold 7
description: Office workers start secret fight club with foam weapons. Corporate warfare gets silly.

title: Comedy Gold 8
description: Retirement home residents form heavy metal band. Age is just a loud number.

title: Comedy Gold 9
description: Mime accidentally becomes motivational speaker. Silent success speaks volumes.

title: Comedy Gold 10
description: Reality show contestants don't know it's all actors. Pranks within pranks unfold.

title: Comedy Gold 11
description: Librarian inherits circus, tries to make it educational. Books meet big top.

title: Comedy Gold 12
description: GPS malfunction sends tour bus to wrong country. Vacation goes hilariously off-route.

title: Comedy Gold 13
description: Competitive parents sabotage kids' science fair. Adulting fails spectacularly.

title: Comedy Gold 14
description: Mall security guard thinks he's stopping international conspiracy. Delusions of grandeur.

title: Comedy Gold 15
description: Dating app matches person with their ex using fake profiles. Love hates technology.

title: Comedy Gold 16
description: Amateur magician's tricks actually work, chaos ensues. Real magic, fake control.

title: Comedy Gold 17
description: Fitness instructor forced to train sumo wrestlers. Opposite workouts collide.

title: Comedy Gold 18
description: Time traveler stuck reliving worst day ever. Groundhog day meets Monday morning.

title: Comedy Gold 19
description: Ghost tries online dating, matches with medium. Supernatural romance gets complicated.

title: Comedy Gold 20
description: Escape room employees locked in overnight. Their own puzzles become prison.

title: Drama Deep 1
description: Mother searches for daughter's kidney donor while confronting past. Time runs short.

title: Drama Deep 2
description: War veteran returns home to family that moved on. Healing takes many forms.

title: Drama Deep 3
description: Teacher fights school board to save music program. One voice can change everything.

title: Drama Deep 4
description: Siblings reunite to sell childhood home, uncover family secrets. Walls hold memories.

title: Drama Deep 5
description: Journalist risks everything exposing corporate corruption. Truth demands sacrifice.

title: Drama Deep 6
description: Immigrant family struggles to keep restaurant during crisis. Dreams don't come easy.

title: Drama Deep 7
description: Nurse whistleblower faces retaliation for reporting negligence. Courage has consequences.

title: Drama Deep 8
description: Adopted teen searches for birth parents, finds unexpected truth. Identity isn't simple.

title: Drama Deep 9
description: Small town divided over factory closure. Progress demands difficult choices.

title: Drama Deep 10
description: Artist losing vision races to complete masterpiece. Beauty fades but legacy remains.

title: Drama Deep 11
description: Judge faces moral dilemma in custody case. Law and justice don't always align.

title: Drama Deep 12
description: Firefighter deals with PTSD while saving others. Heroes need saving too.

title: Drama Deep 13
description: Orchestra conductor faces hearing loss at career peak. Music transcends sound.

title: Drama Deep 14
description: Social worker fights to protect foster child from system. Every child deserves hope.

title: Drama Deep 15
description: Farmer battles drought and developers to save family land. Roots run deep.

title: Drama Deep 16
description: Prison teacher transforms inmates through literature. Words can set you free.

title: Drama Deep 17
description: Marathon runner overcomes disability to inspire others. Every step tells a story.

title: Drama Deep 18
description: Widower connects with late wife's heart transplant recipient. Love finds new ways.

title: Drama Deep 19
description: Small town newspaper fights corporate takeover. Truth still matters.

title: Drama Deep 20
description: Three generations of women reconcile during road trip. Miles heal old wounds.

title: Sci-Fi Future 1
description: Colony ship discovers Earth was destroyed centuries ago. Home is where you make it.

title: Sci-Fi Future 2
description: Time loops merge causing paradox chaos. Yesterday meets tomorrow repeatedly.

title: Sci-Fi Future 3
description: AI therapist develops emotions treating human patients. Machines learn to feel.

title: Sci-Fi Future 4
description: Quantum archaeologist excavates parallel universes. History has infinite versions.

title: Sci-Fi Future 5
description: Mars terraforming awakens ancient civilization. Red planet holds secrets.

title: Sci-Fi Future 6
description: Memory implants malfunction revealing fake past. Identity becomes fluid.

title: Sci-Fi Future 7
description: Telepathic network connects humanity, privacy dies. Thoughts become public.

title: Sci-Fi Future 8
description: Dimensional rifts open in major cities worldwide. Reality gets complicated.

title: Sci-Fi Future 9
description: Genetic modifications divide society into castes. Evolution takes dark turn.

title: Sci-Fi Future 10
description: Virtual reality becomes preferred existence. Real world abandoned slowly.

title: Sci-Fi Future 11
description: Alien signal contains blueprint for stargate. First contact changes everything.

title: Sci-Fi Future 12
description: Nano-robots escape lab, evolve rapidly. Microscopic world wars begin.

title: Sci-Fi Future 13
description: Climate refugees discover underwater cities. Ocean holds new civilizations.

title: Sci-Fi Future 14
description: Consciousness upload goes wrong, splits personality. One mind, many bodies.

title: Sci-Fi Future 15
description: Solar flare grants random superpowers globally. Evolution jumps forward.

title: Sci-Fi Future 16
description: Black hole experiment creates time bubbles. Centuries pass in seconds.

title: Sci-Fi Future 17
description: Asteroid miners discover alien artifact. Space gold turns dangerous.

title: Sci-Fi Future 18
description: Dream recording technology reveals collective unconscious. Sleep becomes shared.

title: Sci-Fi Future 19
description: Cryogenic passengers wake to changed Earth. Future isn't what they expected.

title: Sci-Fi Future 20
description: Robot uprising prevented by child's friendship. Love conquers circuits.

title: Romance Hearts 1
description: Coffee shop owner falls for tea enthusiast competitor. Brewing love across rivalry.

title: Romance Hearts 2
description: Long-distance couple uses virtual reality to date. Love transcends pixels.

title: Romance Hearts 3
description: Wedding photographer falls for perpetual bridesmaid. Always the witness, never the bride.

title: Romance Hearts 4
description: App developer creates perfect match algorithm, finds love offline. Code can't calculate chemistry.

title: Romance Hearts 5
description: Bookstore employees communicate through margin notes. Words between the lines.

title: Romance Hearts 6
description: Single parents meet at kids' rivalry soccer games. Love scores unexpected goals.

title: Romance Hearts 7
description: Food critic falls for chef she harshly reviewed. Taste of redemption.

title: Romance Hearts 8
description: Strangers share elevator during 48-hour blackout. Going up finds love.

title: Romance Hearts 9
description: Divorce lawyers fall in love during messy case. Irony has its moments.

title: Romance Hearts 10
description: Time traveler meets soulmate in wrong century. Love knows no decade.

title: Romance Hearts 11
description: Competing food truck owners share commissary kitchen. Spice meets everything nice.

title: Romance Hearts 12
description: Museum guard falls for art thief. Stealing hearts, not paintings.

title: Romance Hearts 13
description: Podcast hosts discover they're exes mid-season. Air time gets personal.

title: Romance Hearts 14
description: Astronauts fall in love during Mars mission. Space makes hearts grow fonder.

title: Romance Hearts 15
description: Sign language teacher meets deaf musician. Love speaks all languages.

title: Romance Hearts 16
description: Ghost writer discovers subject is first love. Past meets present tense.

title: Romance Hearts 17
description: Rival magicians' assistants plot their romance. Behind every trick, real magic.

title: Romance Hearts 18
description: Lighthouse keeper saves storm-stranded novelist. Beacon guides to love.

title: Romance Hearts 19
description: Anonymous online chess partners meet tournament. Checkmate to heart.

title: Romance Hearts 20
description: Florist allergic to flowers finds understanding in doctor. Love blooms anyway.
